==German== {{picdic |image=Human head and brain diagram.svg |width=310 |labels= {{picdiclabel|de|color=black|fontsize=12|posx=150|posy=3|link=Schädel}} {{picdiclabel|de|color=black|fontsize=18|posx=170|posy=90|link=Gehirn}} {{picdiclabel|de|color=black|fontsize=12|posx=80|posy=160|link=Auge|align=left}} {{picdiclabel|de|color=black|fontsize=12|posx=15|posy=190|link=Nase|align=left}} {{picdiclabel|de|color=black|fontsize=12|posx=50|posy=230|link=Mund|align=left}} {{picdiclabel|de|color=black|fontsize=12|posx=35|posy=285|link=Kinn}} {{picdiclabel|de|color=black|fontsize=12|posx=90|posy=270|link=Kiefer}} {{picdiclabel|de|color=black|fontsize=12|posx=175|posy=205|link=Ohr|align=right}} {{picdiclabel|de|color=black|fontsize=12|posx=120|posy=140|link=Schläfe}} {{picdiclabel|de|color=black|fontsize=12|posx=185|posy=290|link=Hals}} |detail1=Click on labels in the image |detail2= {{picdicimg|de|image=Human body features-nb.svg|link=Körper}} }} ===Alternative forms=== * {{alter|de|Kopp}} {{q|colloquial; northern and central Germany}} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|kopf||drinking vessel}}, from {{inh|de|goh|kopf}}, {{m|goh|chopf}}, {{m|goh|kupf|t=mug, bowl, head}}, of {{unk|de|title=uncertain}} origin. Possibly from {{der|de|LL.|cuppa}}, probably a form of {{der|de|la|cūpa||tub}} from {{der|de|ine-pro|*kewp-||a hollow}}; related to {{cog|en|cup}}. Compare {{cog|en|noggin}}, and {{m|en|mug}}. French {{m|fr|tête}}. Alternatively it is inherited from {{der|de|gem-pro|*kuppaz|t=round object, bowl, crown of the head}}, whilst influenced by the aforesaid Latin word, and if so then related to obsolete {{cog|en|cop||the crown (of the head); the head}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/kɔpf/|[kɔp͡f]|[kɔp͡ɸ]}} * {{audio|de|De-Kopf.ogg|audio (Standard German)}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|m|Kopfes|gen2=Kopfs|Köpfe}} # {{lb|de|anatomy}} [[head]] #: {{ux|de|Er fiel die Treppe hinunter, als sie ihm ein Buch an den '''Kopf''' warf.|He fell down the stairs when she threw a book at his '''head'''.}} # [[crown]], [[top]] # [[heading]], [[title]] # [[person]]; [[individual]]; [[fellow]] (referring to one's intellect or mentality) #: {{ux|de|Er ist ein heller '''Kopf'''.|He's a bright fellow.|lit=He is a bright head.}} # {{lb|de|linguistics}} [[head]] # {{senseid|de|Q257418}} {{lb|de|numismatics}} [[heads]] {{gloss|side of a coin}} ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-m|(e)s|pl=Köpfe}} ====Synonyms==== * {{sense|head}} {{l|de|Haupt}} ====Hyponyms==== {{col3|de |Quatschkopf |Schwachkopf |Briefkopf |Brückenkopf |Doppelkopf |Dummkopf |Hinterkopf |Hitzkopf |Notenkopf }} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|-köpfig}} * {{l|de|verkopft}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|Kopfhörer}} * {{l|de|Kopfkino}} * {{l|de|Stahlkopfforelle}} * {{l|de|Kopf-an-Kopf-Rennen}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
